div.div:
- domain: AF_INET(6), AF_UNIX, AF_ISO
- type: SOCK_STREAM, SOCK_DGRAM, SOCK_RAW
- protocol: if using AF_INET + SOCK_STREAM, then 0

div.div:
- socket: ID of created socket
- address: prefilled struct with info
- address_len: size of portability

- backlog: defines maximum number of pending connections before refusing
